data.message: Hookify rule gotchas: 1) Regex without ^ anchor matches anywhere in command including commit messages - use ^ to anchor to command start, 2) Credentials-gate pattern matching "secrets" blocks reading telemetry logs - rename files to avoid trigger words, 3) PostToolUse systemMessages may not surface in UI - use telemetry as backup, 4) Plugin cache modifications are ephemeral - backup to hooks-backup/ directory.
